tidygeocoder 1.0.2.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Geocoding functions

These are the main functions to call for geocoding

geocode()

Geocode addresses in a dataframe

geo()

Geocode addresses

reverse_geocode()

Reverse geocode coordinates in a dataframe

reverse_geo()

Reverse geocode coordinates

Convenience functions for forward geocoding

geo_cascade()

Convenience function for calling the geo function with method = 'cascade'

geo_census() geo_osm() geo_geocodio() geo_iq() geo_google() geo_opencage() geo_mapbox() geo_here() geo_tomtom() geo_mapquest() geo_bing()

Convenience functions for calling the geo function with a specified method

Data

louisville

Louisville, Kentucky street addresses

sample_addresses

Some sample addresses for testing

Reference Datasets

These datasets are used to set parameters and settings for geocoder queries

api_parameter_reference

Geocoder service API parameter reference

min_time_reference

The minimum number of seconds required per query to comply with usage restrictions

batch_limit_reference

The batch limit for each geocoder service

Utility Functions

get_api_query()

Construct a geocoder API query

query_api()

Execute a geocoder API query

extract_results()

Extract forward geocoding results

extract_reverse_results()

Extract reverse geocoding results

Contents
